${ModID}:ExitDrive.NAME: Exit
${ModID}:ExitDrive.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exits current ${ModID}:Drive_Form. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Courage.NAME: Courage
${ModID}:Courage.DESCRIPTION: Enter ${ModID}:Valor_Form. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Wisdom.NAME: Wisdom
${ModID}:Wisdom.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Enter ${ModID}:Wisdom_Form. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s} NL Discard 1 card.

${ModID}:InnerStrength.NAME: Inner Strength
${ModID}:InnerStrength.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Adds damage equal to half of your ${ModID}:Drive_Points.
${ModID}:InnerStrength.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Adds damage equal to your ${ModID}:Drive_Points.

${ModID}:AddedBenefits.NAME: Added Benefits
${ModID}:AddedBenefits.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Strong: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL ${ModID}:Wise: Apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:ComboMaster.NAME: Combo Master
${ModID}:ComboMaster.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL ${ModID}:Combo: Apply to ALL enemies NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PowerBoost.NAME: Power Boost
${ModID}:PowerBoost.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for every !M! ${ModID}:Drive_Points. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FauxMastery.NAME: Faux Mastery
${ModID}:FauxMastery.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Valor_Form and ${ModID}:Wisdom_Form no longer consume ${ModID}:Drive_Points at the end of turn.

${ModID}:DriveBank.NAME: Drive Bank
${ModID}:DriveBank.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Bank up to !M! ${ModID}:Drive_Points each turn while in a ${ModID}:Drive_Form.

${ModID}:BerserkCharge.NAME: Berserk Charge
${ModID}:BerserkCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL ${ModID}:Combo: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Drive_Points X times.

${ModID}:SynchBlade.NAME: Synch Blade
${ModID}:SynchBlade.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage twice. NL ${ModID}:Strong: Deal !D! damage !M! additional time{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:MagnetBurst.NAME: Magnet Burst
${ModID}:MagnetBurst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Combo: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Drive_Points per enemy dealt unblocked damage.

${ModID}:AutoValor.NAME: Auto Valor
${ModID}:AutoValor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy does not intend to attack, enter ${ModID}:Valor_Form.

${ModID}:CounterGuard.NAME: Counter Guard
${ModID}:CounterGuard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to half of unblocked damage dealt. NL ${ModID}:Strong: Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:ComboPlus.NAME: Combo Plus
${ModID}:ComboPlus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Combo: Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

${ModID}:DefenseBoost.NAME: Defense Boost
${ModID}:DefenseBoost.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Consume !M! ${ModID}:Drive_Points and gain 1 Dexterity.

${ModID}:AutoWisdom.NAME: Auto Wisdom
${ModID}:AutoWisdom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, enter ${ModID}:Wisdom_Form.

${ModID}:QuickThinking.NAME: Quick Thinking
${ModID}:QuickThinking.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M!. NL ${ModID}:Combo: Draw 1 card.

${ModID}:Magnet.NAME: Magnet
${ModID}:Magnet.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Wise: Put !M! card{!M!|>1=s} from your discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:Defender.NAME: Defender
${ModID}:Defender.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Combo: Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:AffinityForValor.NAME: Affinity For Valor
${ModID}:AffinityForValor.DESCRIPTION: If you are in ${ModID}:Valor_Form gain !M! Strength, otherwise enter ${ModID}:Valor_Form.

${ModID}:APBoost.NAME: AP Boost
${ModID}:APBoost.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. NL ${ModID}:Spell: Gain [E] [E] .
${ModID}:APBoost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. NL ${ModID}:Spell: Gain [E] [E] [E] .

${ModID}:RoundBreak.NAME: Round Break
${ModID}:RoundBreak.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Drive_Point{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:QuickRun.NAME: Quick Run
${ModID}:QuickRun.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! cards. NL Discard !${ModID}:m2! card{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s}. NL ${ModID}:Wise: Draw 2 extra cards.

${ModID}:MagicLockOn.NAME: Magic Lock-On
${ModID}:MagicLockOn.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Scry !M!.

${ModID}:MPHaste.NAME: MP Haste
${ModID}:MPHaste.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, NL gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Spell: Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:DriveGenerator.NAME: Drive Generator
${ModID}:DriveGenerator.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn gain !M! ${ModID}:Drive_Points.

${ModID}:ClearMind.NAME: Clear Mind
${ModID}:ClearMind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scry !M!, gain !${ModID}:m2! Block per card discarded this way.

${ModID}:FlareForce.NAME: Flare Force
${ModID}:FlareForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:MobileAction.NAME: Mobile Action
${ModID}:MobileAction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a random card from your hand. NL ${ModID}:Wise: Choose a card to discard instead.

${ModID}:Reflect.NAME: Reflect
${ModID}:Reflect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reflect 50% of attack damage back at enemies this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reflect 75% of attack damage back at enemies this turn.
Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Reflect attack damage back at enemies this turn.

${ModID}:Finisher.NAME: Finisher
${ModID}:Finisher.DESCRIPTION: After playing 3 ${ModID}:Combo cards in a row, your next played card is played twice.

${ModID}:DriveBoost.NAME: Drive Boost
${ModID}:DriveBoost.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! extra ${ModID}:Drive_Point whenever you gain ${ModID}:Drive_Points.
${ModID}:DriveBoost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! extra ${ModID}:Drive_Point whenever you gain ${ModID}:Drive_Points.

${ModID}:Finality.NAME: Finality
${ModID}:Finality.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Drive_Points. NL Enter ${ModID}:Final_Form. NL Exhaust.
